column4: He tried the fix detailed in this forum thread: http://www.bigguyspinball.com/community/viewtopic.php?f=18&t=941 and that made it not boot.
Hiding joins and quits makes this channel much more readable.
just add the username of the person you want to talk to.. and then when he replies it will get highlighted (if not, try looking into the options of your program)
